sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>reality</radical> of <radical>gold</radical> is that it has the power to <kanji>tranquilize</kanji> anyone who gets their hands on it. Gold may seem cool to have in movies and songs, but in reality, it has the power to mess you up!
meaningInfo: Imagine being tranquilized by the sweet caress of gold coins. You can't even move. You're in a daze or something.
readingMnemonic: You've been <kanji>tranquilize</kanji>d and now drool is running down your <reading>chin</reading> (<ja>ちん</ja>). It's actually really gross. But you don't care, look at all this gold! No one will care about your chin when you're rich!
readingInfo: If you let gold tranquilize you, you'll drool all over your own chin. Maybe the chins of other people too, who knows?
